document.text:
From 
Subject: 
Date: Thu, 01 Oct 2020 16:52:59 +0000 
• Between approximately 2002 and 2005, scheduled dozens of appointments for underage girls to provide 
massages to Epstein. The majority of these appointments took place at Epstein's Palm Beach residence. 
occasionally scheduled appointments at Epstein's New York residence. 
• During that same time period, Epstein typically received approximately two massages per day—usually one in the 
morning and one in the afternoon. was primarily responsible for scheduling those appointments in Palm 
Beach, but she occasionally scheduled them in New York. 
• When girls arrived for the appointments at Palm Beach, sometimes met them, walked them up to the 
massage room, and set up the massage table for the girls. 
• After at least some of the appointments, paid the girls in cash. 
• During the massage appointments with minor girls that scheduled, Epstein sexually abused 
the minor 
girls by, 
• Through this process, met dozens of underage victims, who ranged in age from 14 to 17 years old. Some 
of those victims did not have licenses, and arranged for a driver to pick them up. Some of those victims 
told they could not make certain appointment times because they had school. Epstein told that at 
least one of those victims was studying for the SATs. 
• At Epstein's direction, took nude photos of underage victims. 
• walked in on at least one massage during which a victim was nude while massaging Epstein. 
• was present for one massage during which Epstein 
• walked in on one instance in which a Epstein. 
• After learning about the investigation into Epstein, called victims and encouraged them not to talk to law 
enforcement. At Epstein's direction, offered financial incentives to victims for not speaking with law 
enforcement. 
EFTA00028048
